mapper.insert: INSERT INTO GUIDE(SCHCODE, GUIDENAME, TIMEZONE, WORKDATE, ROLE, MEMO, USERSCODE) VALUES(GUIDE_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{name}, #{timezone}, #{workDate}, #{role}, #{memo}, #{usersCode})
mapper.select: SELECT NAME FROM STAFF WHERE USERSCODE= #{usersCode}
SELECT SCHCODE, GUIDENAME AS NAME, TIMEZONE, WORKDATE, ROLE, MEMO, USERSCODE FROM GUIDE WHERE SCHCODE !=0

SELECT G.SCHCODE, GUIDENAME, TIMEZONE, TO_CHAR(WORKDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') WORKDATE, ROLE, MEMO, G.USERSCODE, GB.USERSCODE AS USERSCODEM, BOOKCODE, TO_CHAR(BOOKDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') BOOKDATE, TEL, NAME AS NAMEM FROM GUIDE G LEFT OUTER JOIN GUIDEBOOK GB ON G.SCHCODE = GB.SCHCODE WHERE G.SCHCODE = #{schCode}
mapper.update: UPDATE GUIDEBOOK SET SCHCODE = 0 WHERE SCHCODE = #{schCode}
